title: Manjubhandira Haaram - Exquisite Coral and Diamond Necklace
materials: South Sea Pearls (cream hue). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster and durability.
features: This stunning Haaram features a geometric pendant design, each delicately inlaid with brilliant cut diamonds and a central coral. The necklace is accented with cascading South Sea pearl drops, creating a graceful sway. The design beautifully balances tradition with modern sensibilities.
occasions: or elegant evening events. A treasure to be cherished for generations.
description: Crafted with meticulous detail by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The piece showcases high-quality natural coral known for its auspicious properties and brings a touch of traditional elegance. The diamonds add a touch of modern sparkle making it a timeless treasure and a valuable heirloom (Sampradayam Aabharna).
